articles.author: Naman Agarwal
articles.title: ‘Depends on how flat the wickets get’ – Pat Cummins, when asked if Australia will use Mankads and underarm bowling | Ashes 2023 - Wisden
articles.description: Pat Cummins came up with a cheeky response when he was asked whether there'll be more Mankads and under-arm bowling from Australia in the Ashes in his post-match press conference after the Lord's Test.
articles.content: Pat Cummins came up with a cheeky response when he was asked whether there’ll be more Mankads and under-arm bowling from Australia in the Ashes in his post-match press conference after the Lord’s Tes… [+1948 chars]
